content: this mesmerizing crochet blanket is sure to enchant your bundle of joy stitched in bernat baby blanket and bernat baby blanket sparkle it s an easy-level pattern that s fun to do for a new mom three shades of baby blanket are worked in each round to give it that big swirl look practice chain double_crochet single_crochet and half_double_crochet on this project that will keep you entertained from beginning to end video tutorial from the crochet crowd https //www youtube com/watch v=dlgoiwikkrg yarns for model bernat® baby blanket sparkle™ 10 5 oz/300g 220 yds/201 m contrast a moonlight sparkle 71001 1 ball or 176 yds/161 m contrast b seafoam sparkle 71005 1 ball or 176 yds/161 m bernat® baby blanket™ 10 5 oz/300g 220 yds/201 m contrast c starry sky 04873 1 ball or 176 yds/161 m
